definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: An amperometric biosensor for the rapid determination of the hydrogen peroxide is described.
sentences.chinese: 一种用于快速检测过氧化氢的电流型生物传感器。

sentences.english: Fertilization shows no significant effects on the activities of catalase and sucrase.
sentences.chinese: 施肥对蔗糖酶和过氧化氢酶活性的影响较小。

sentences.english: That something seems to be related to an enzyme called catalase.
sentences.chinese: 这种物质似乎与一种名叫过氧化氢酶的酶有关。

sentences.english: They say hydrogen peroxide or carbamide peroxide may also help.
sentences.chinese: 他们说过氧化氢和过氧化脲也可能对此会有帮助。

sentences.english: Polyester fibers may also be bleached with hydrogen peroxide or sodium hypochlorite.
sentences.chinese: 涤纶纤维可用过氧化氢或次氯酸钠漂白。

sentences.english: Chlorpromazine hydrochloride (CPH ) is oxidized by hydrogen peroxide under the catalyzing of nitrite.
sentences.chinese: 亚硝酸盐催化氯丙嗪与过氧化氢的氧化反应。

sentences.english: The hydrogen peroxide and the oxygen free grave have the intense sensitization, the damage organization.
sentences.chinese: 过氧化氢和氧自由墓具有强烈敏化作用，损伤组织。

sentences.english: The paper mainly studied the processing conditions of bamboo by hydrogen peroxide alkaline pulping in lab.
sentences.chinese: 对竹片碱性过氧化氢法制浆工艺条件进行了探讨。

sentences.english: However, there are certain drawbacks to benzyl peroxide.
sentences.chinese: 但是，也有某些弊端，以苯过氧化氢。

sentences.english: In this work, a thermophilic strain with high catalase activity designated SHT2 was isolated from the composting.
sentences.chinese: 本研究从堆肥中分离了一株产过氧化氢酶的嗜热菌。

sentences.english: Empty out an eyedropper and fill up it with hydrogen peroxide.
sentences.chinese: 空出一个吸管和填补与过氧化氢。

sentences.english: The drive for the turbopump units was actuated using hydrogen peroxide.
sentences.chinese: 涡轮泵由过氧化氢分解产生的气体驱动。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ured peroxide is much better than that of hydrogen peroxide when both used as the hydrogen accepter of substrate A.
sentences.chinese: 结论过氧化脲比过氧化氢更适宜作底物A中的受氢体。

sentences.english: They say hygerun prosi hydrogen peroxide or capberma proranposi carbamide peroxide may also help.
sentences.chinese: 他们说过氧化氢和氧化尿素也有用。

sentences.english: Hydrogen peroxide's bleaching characteristics of deinked pulp was studied in the paper .
sentences.chinese: 研究了脱墨浆过氧化氢漂白特性。

sentences.english: The purification procedures of heparin by double oxidation process with H_2O_2 were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 采用过氧化氢二次氧化法精制肝素钠。
